comment._content: This kind of history is such a true beauty of photography. I love these images. - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - I saw this Spectacular Photo in: Chicagoland Architecture, Engineering and Art!
